word: MANSIONS PREPARED FOR REDEEMED.\97How great will be the joy when the redeemed of the Lord shall all meet\97gathered into the mansions prepared for them! Oh, what rejoicing for all who have been impartial, unselfish laborers together with God in carrying forward His work in the earth! What satisfaction will every reaper have, when the clear, musical voice of Jesus shall be heard, saying, \93Come, ye blessed of My Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world.\94 \93Enter thou into the joy of thy Lord.\94RH October 10, 1907 quoted in CS 348.
